## async-call-rpc package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AsyncCall(thisSideImplementation, options)](./async-call-rpc.asynccall.md) | Async call between different context. |
|  [AsyncGeneratorCall(implementation, options)](./async-call-rpc.asyncgeneratorcall.md) | This function provides the async generator version of the AsyncCall |

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
